title: 48 in. Fiberglass Handle Closed Back Round Point Shovel
description: This closed back round point shovel has the perfect design for working in all areas. It features a closed back with a steel plate welded over the pocket on the underside of the blade that adds strength and keeps dirt from piling up. This shovel is ideal for contractor as well as professional use on the jobsite. The 48 in. fiberglass handle was made for comfort and durability.
